title: Query SPL Token Balance
description: Query the SPL token balance of a specific address by calling the balanceOf function.
- Use contract.balanceOf(address) to query token balance
- The return value is in token's smallest unit (considering decimals)
- This is a read-only view function, no transaction is required
- Balance should be returned as uint256
- Create contract instance with token address and SPL ABI
- Return both raw balance (in wei/smallest unit) and human-readable balance
- Consider token decimals when converting to human-readable format
natural_language_templates: Query the balance of token mint {token_address}
Check the token balance for mint {token_address}
What is the balance of token mint {token_address}?
